titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Banking ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Banking. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Proxmire. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/14/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs, from March 1, 1987, through February 28, 1988, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide for the training of its professional staff.
